General.Name: Foshan Saturday Shoes Co Ltd
General.Description: Foshan Yowant Technology Co.,Ltd designs, develops, manufactures, and markets footwear products primarily in Mainland China. The company engages in the sale of multi-brand mid-to-high-end fashion leather shoes, as well as the wholesale and retail of diversified fashion products; and the information technology service business with mobile Internet precision marketing. It offers its products under the ST&SAT, D:FUSE, SAFIYA, SATURDAYMODE, and FONDBERYL brand names. The company was formerly known as Saturday Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Foshan Yowant Technology Co.,Ltd in November 2022. Foshan Yowant Technology Co.,Ltd was founded in 2002 and is based in Foshan, China.

3.Name: Mr. Jian Feng  He
3.Title: Deputy GM, Sec. of the Board & Non-Independent Director
